name: coapack
description: An application to make modular, light & customisable setup packages for your apps
author: Gum-Joe <kishansambhi@hotmail.co.uk>

scripts.travis:coverage: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
